Articles.Content:
False

The user below me hates ponies

I'm indiffrent to ponies. Although they can get annoying in this forum.

The user below me likes the color purple.

false...it represents being gay in the chinese culture so...

(true fact)

the user below me thinks I'm joking

I believe you - but whats wrong with beeing gay?!

The user below me likes the color red.

True, second favorite to gold

user below me plays tf2

True.

The user below me has played Kerbal Space program.

I'm surprised you're even asking this. Yes.

Next poster is learning how to write in Elian Script.

false(there's nothing wrong it's just a fact)

the user below me get's it................................

do you mean Elvish script or Elian because on both no

the user below me actually knows what he means......

false

the user below me has gotten ninjaed before..../had to suffer through a mod post train

false

The user below me has had Jeb eaten by a Kraken.

semi-true. does crashing jeb into the kraken on bop count?

the user below me is classified as insane in at least 3 countries.

We all are probably. Different cultures. So yeah.

The user below me farted on someone else's face.

...who hasn't...

the user below me has a anthos/furry avatar

Nope.

The user below me has an avatar.

Sorry.

The user below me is in a relationship with a person seven months older than them.

I'm not In a relationship but getting there...

The user below me knows someone IRL who likes KSP

Sort of. I know people who have played it, at least, but as far as I know, none of them are frequent players, none of them are on this forum.

The person below me has slept through an appointment they didn't know they had...

Nej.

The user below me believes they have a fictional value of 'swag'.

False, no sane person would have this 'swag'

The user below me has been in a car crash

Reality, no.

GT4, oh I've lost count.

The user below me forgot struts on their station.

Nope.

The user below me wishes they had a space station.

True, I cant build one if it saved my life

The user below me hates cats

False, I love my cat

The user below me has never been to Wales.

True, but... y maent yr mynyddoedd yn canu, ac y mae'r arglwyddes yn dod.

The user below me immediately took that to Google Translate and is now thoroughly confused.
